lg.l: Said to be Mr 08. Popes.──
How vain are Mortal mans Endeavours,
Said att St James's Master Trevers,
Good Orleans Dead in truth tis hard!
Oh! may all Statesmen dye prepar'd!
I do forsee, (and in foreseeing
I'll equal any man in being)
The Army Ne'er can be Disbanded.
I wish the King were safely L overwriting another characteranded.
Ah! Friends! great Dangers threat this Land,
All France, and England's att a Stand.
There's Mireways──do ye mark──strange work
And there's the Czar,──and there's the Turk──
And Pope──an Indian Merchant by
Cut Short his Speech, by this reply.
Things att a Stand? why Dread Such Changes?
Ah Sir you never Saw the Ganges.
There dwells a race, we call 'em Monkies,
Grave, Sober, Sage, like your Quid nunc-ies
On Either side from bough, to bough──
They meet and Chat as we do now,
Whispers grow round, they Grin, they Shrug
they Bow, they Smile, they Scratch, they Hug,
And Iust as chance or whim provoke 'em
They Either Bite their friends or stroak 'em
There have I seen some active Prig
To shew his parts bestride a Twig,
Lord, How the Chattering tribe admire
Not that he is wiser, but is Higher.
All long to try the ventrous thing,
(For Power is but to have ones Swing)
from Side, to Side he frisks he Bounces,
till the twig Breaks, and in he flounces,
Down the Swift Stream the wretch is born
Never, Ah never to return.
Z────nds what a fall has our dear Brother,
Morblieu crys one, and Damme tother.
The Natives give a General Screec overwriting th
None Cocks his tale, none Claws his Breech.
Each trembles for the Publick W overwriting Zeal
And for a time forgets to Steal.
A while all Eyes Intent and Steddy,
Pursue him whirling Down the Eddy.
But out of Mind when out of vieu,
Some other mounts the twig a new
And Busynes on each Monkey shore
Runs the Same track it did before.Y20-176Y
